title: CSS Bundler

title: JS Bundler
description: Implemented: ES6/CommonJS dependency resolution, topological sorting, IIFE wrapping, tree shaking (~20%), minification (50-60%), source maps. 17 functions, 5 modules, reused 5 CSS functions. (2025-02-04)

title: Static File Server
description: ETag-based caching, gzip/brotli compression, build-time pre-compression, security headers, path traversal prevention. 20 functions, 39 tests, 6 new error variants. Routes: /static/{css,js,images,fonts,maps}/*

title: Binary Compiler
description: Release build with LTO, symbol stripping, UPX compression, SHA256/MD5 checksums, tar.gz packaging, version management. 22 functions, 28 tests, Cargo.toml profiles configured. Binary: 15MB → 6MB (UPX)

title: Asset Pipeline

title: File Watcher

title: Function System & Caching
description: Smart Indices system with HashMap/BTreeMap backends for 100-1000x faster queries via automatic index selection, O(1) exact lookups, O(log n) range scans, and 30x memory reduction (commit 56b9dda)

title: CLI SQL Query Interface
description: Custom ReedQL parser with subquery support (IN, NOT IN, EXISTS), recursive CTE, aggregate functions, Smart Index integration, and ReedBase-specific optimizations (commit 4afe212)

title: Performance Testing
description: Comprehensive benchmarking suite with regression detection

title: Complete Documentation
description: Complete ReedBase documentation with user guide, API docs, and tutorials

title: B+-Tree Index Engine
description: B+-Tree implementation with internal/leaf node split, Order-based capacity, crash recovery via CRC32/delta reconstruction, mmap persistence, and WAL support (commit 0c5ec42)

title: Migrate Smart Indices to B+-Tree
description: Integrated B+-Tree with Smart Indices via Index trait, supporting HashMap/BTreeMap/BTreeIndex backends with pluggable architecture for 100x cold start improvement (commit b11a22e)

title: ReedQL Range-Query Optimization
description: Query optimizer with cost-based planning that detects indexed columns and uses range scans instead of table scans, achieving 100-1000x speedup via Smart Index integration (commit fb2ee58)

title: Version-Log Index
description: Dual-index architecture with timestamp and frame B+-Tree indices for version history, 100x faster point-in-time recovery (10s→100ms), 50x faster frame lookups, rebuild maintenance tool (commit e64cb49)
